verses.verse: And these are the inheritances which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, which Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, distributed unto them <S%H5157><s%>,

by the lot <S%H1486><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, for the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%>, and for the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%>.

For Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: but unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>.

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%>, Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: and they gave <S%H5414><s%> no portion <S%H2506><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, save cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H4054><s%>, with the suburbs thereof for their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and for their substance <S%H7075><s%>.
As Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%>; and they divided <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> drew <S%H5066><s%> nigh unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>: and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3045><s%>, Thou knowest the thing <S%H1697><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> concerning me <S%H182><s%> and concerning thee <S%H182><s%> in Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%>.

Forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> was I when Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me from Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>; and I brought <S%H7725><s%> him word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> as it was in my heart <S%H3824><s%>.

Nevertheless my brethren <S%H251><s%> that went up <S%H5927><s%> with me made the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> melt <S%H4529><s%>; but I wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Surely the land <S%H776><s%> whereon thy foot <S%H7272><s%> hath trodden <S%H1869><s%> shall be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to thee and to thy children <S%H1121><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, because thou hast wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>.

And now <S%H3068><s%>, behold, Jehovah hath kept me alive <S%H2421><s%>, as he spake <S%H1696><s%>, these forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, from the time <S%H227><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, while Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: and now <S%H3117><s%>, lo, I am this day fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>.

As yet I am as strong <S%H2389><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> as I as in the day <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me <S%H3581><s%>: as my strength was then <S%H3581><s%>, even so is my strength now <S%H4421><s%>, for war, and to go out <S%H3318><s%> and to come in <S%H935><s%>.

Now therefore give <S%H5414><s%> me this hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, whereof Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>; for thou heardest <S%H8085><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> how the Anakim <S%H6062><s%> were there <S%H5892><s%>, and cities great <S%H1419><s%> and fortified <S%H1219><s%>: it may be that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will be <S%H194><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me <S%H3423><s%>, and I shall drive them out, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him <S%H5414><s%>; and he gave Hebron <S%H2275><s%> unto Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

Therefore Hebron <S%H2275><s%> became the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>; because that he wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> beforetime <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath-arba <S%H7153><s%>; which Arba was the greatest <S%H1419><s%> man <S%H120><s%> among the Anakim <S%H6062><s%>. And the land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> from war <S%H4421><s%>.
